original_title: K5 Katutubong Kahoy Kontra Krisis sa Klima
overview: A micro-documentary film focused on planting native trees for climate resilience and biodiversity conservation.  The film discusses how planting native trees, while limited, is an important nature-based solution for mitigating the climate crisis.
title: K5 Katutubong Kahoy Kontra Krisis sa Klima
